text: The Commissioner may promulgate rules and regulations necessary or appropriate to implement the provisions of this chapter.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 17-155 substituted "necessary or appropriate" for "necessary".

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-264, see notes following § 31-1131.01.

For Law 17-155, see notes following § 31-1131.02.

DC CODE § 31-1131.18

Current through December 11, 2012
